description:
The Quin Zaza airship sails the skies in pursuit of the deadliest (and tastiest) magical monsters in the blue: DRAGONS. While most people fear these scaly beasts, the crew of the Zaza specializes in bringing them down to earth to offer the world the medicine and food only dragons can provide. It’s a tough living, and the price for failure is all too often death, but the rewards for success are riches immeasurable — not to mention the most delicious cuisine around!

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

Note: All episodes premiered on Netflix on January 9, 2020, but aired weekly on TV.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Full CGI
tags.description: Almost entirely created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Aviation
tags.description: Regarding the flying or operation of aircraft.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Steampunk
tags.description: Prominently features technology and designs inspired by 19th-century industrial steam-powered machinery.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

title.native: 千雪のファッションチェック！

node.description:
__Graduated:__ Kunitachi College of Music (Department of Composition)

[Artist Profile (Miracle Bus)](http://miraclebus.com/composer/masaruyokoyama) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/masaruyokoyama)

**Yokoyama Masaru** is a Japanese composer, arranger, keyboardist and programmer affiliated with Miracle Bus.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Yuki_Jouet) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yoh_kamiyama/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCw1U9K3S8WVWp7REGaHIW0A) | [SoundCloud](https://soundcloud.com/uki3) | [Website](https://yohkamiyama.com/) | [Wiki (JP)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%A5%9E%E5%B1%B1%E7%BE%8A)

Yoh Kamiyama is a singer, lyricist, composer and arranger signed to Sony Music Associated Records.

[Instagram](http://www.instagram.com/leonardosanthos) | [Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/leonardosanthos) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/leonardosanthos) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@FalaCritica) | [Twitch](http://www.twitch.tv/FalaCritica)

Leonardo Santhos is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director, and streamer.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Blitzcrank, the Great Steam Golem / Kog'Maw, The Mouth of the Abyss / Vel'Koz, the Eye of the Void / Wukong, the Monkey King (League of Legends)
- Pierce Wheels (Ben 10: Alien Force)
- Peter "Pete" Devin / Master Carter (BONDiNG)
- Agent Bratcher (Outer Banks)
- Henrich Zemo / Baron Zemo (1st voice; The Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Heroes)
- Soren (The Dragon Prince)
- Myst (Grand Chase: Dimensional Chaser)
- Spartan Jared Miller (Halo 4)
- Tetsuya Fukazawa (Ju-On: Origins)
- Kyd Miller (1st voice - 10th season; The X-Files)
- Onix (Gears of War: Judgement)
!~
